description: This file defines a CategorizationService class that performs simple rule-based categorization of documents based on their title and OCR text, returning categories such as invoice, receipt, tax, legal, or uncategorized.

classes.name: CategorizationService
classes.description: A class providing rule-based categorization for document processing.

methods.name: Optional[str] categorize(self, title: str, ocr_text: str)
methods.description: Determines the category of a document from its title and OCR text using keyword rules.

ctags.name: categorize
ctags.pattern: /^    def categorize(self, title: str, ocr_text: str) -> Optional[str]:$/
